price: Por certo, os piores seres animais, perante Allah, são os surdos, os mudos que não razoam.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna sharra al-dawābi ʿinda al-lahi al-ṣumu al-buk'mu alladhīna lā yaʿqilūna
